short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Drunk Driver is a simple and fun game, similar to car racing, your job is to click the mouse to make the car move up.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Drunk Driver is a simple and fun game, similar to car racing, your job is to click the mouse to make the car move up and release the mouse to make the car automatically go down. If you get stuck in the lane or hit another car, you will be blown up. Let's play and win
